content: love woolcraft stocking filler pouches this pattern is written in uk terms hook size 3mm hook throughout yarn double knitting in your preferred brand colour a - red colour b - black colour c - gold colour d - blue colour e - white abbreviations st s - stitch es round s - round s chain - chain magic_ring - magic_ring slip_stitch - slip_stitch double_crochet - double_crochet half_double_crochet - half treble_crochet twist-double_crochet - twisted double_crochet * decrease - double_crochet two together + you will need - sewing needle to make up - sewing scissors - tiny amount of stuffing for the tassels - stitch marker special stitches *twist-double_crochet - insert hook in st yarn over hook and pull through a loop twist hook around 360 degrees anti-clockwise while holding work steady yarn over and pull through two loops on hook +decrease - insert hook in front loop only of next stitch insert hook in front loop only of next st again yarn over and pull through 2 front loops 2 loops should now be on the hook yarn round hook and pull through all 3 loops ~ you have completed an invisible double_crochet decrease 1 of 7 stocking filler pouches | no 3 | love woolcraft 2024 love woolcraft basic pouch work in continuous rounds throughout without turning your work placing a stitch marker on the first stitch of each round using given colour ch20 rnd1 half_double_crochet in third chain from hook half_double_crochet in next 16sts 3htr in next st working back down opposite side of chain half_double_crochet in next 16sts 2htr in base of first st 38sts round 2 ch2 does not count as st throughout half_double_crochet in each st around join with slip_stitch to top of first st in round 38sts round 3-14 repeat round 2 round 15 ch2 half_double_crochet in next two sts ch1 skip next st half_double_crochet in next three sts three times ch1 skip next st half_double_crochet in next four sts ch1 skip next st half_double_crochet in next three sts four times ch1 skip next st half_double_crochet in next two sts join with slip_stitch to top of first st in round 38sts round 16 ch2 half_double_crochet in every st and chain space around join with slip_stitch to top of first st in round 38sts round 17 ch1 twist-double_crochet in every st around join with slip_stitch to top of first st in round 38sts fasten_off and weave in ends tie using given colour ch65 round 1 work slip_stitch in second st from hook and each st across fasten_off bobbles make two using given colour make a magic_ring round 1 into magic_ring work ch1 does not count as st 6dc 6sts pull magic_ring tightly closed at this point round 2 2dc in each st 12sts round 3-4 double_crochet in each st around 12sts 2 of 7 stocking filler pouches | no 3 | love woolcraft 2024 love woolcraft round 5 decrease six times 6sts fasten_off leaving tail to sew and stuff lightly to make up before sewing
